Package org.cpnsim.statemanager

Class DetailedDcStateSimple

java.lang.Object
org.cpnsim.statemanager.DetailedDcStateSimple
public class DetailedDcStateSimple extends Object
Used to describe the status of a data center, including the status of each host and the total resource status of the data center.
Since:
LGDCloudSim 1.0
Author:
Jiawen Liu

  • Constructor Details

    • DetailedDcStateSimple

      public DetailedDcStateSimple(int[] hostStates, HostCapacityManager hostCapacityManager, long cpuAvailableSum, long ramAvailableSum, long storageAvailableSum, long bwAvailableSum)
      Construct a new DetailedDcStateSimple.
      Parameters:
      hostStates - The status of each host in the data center.
      hostCapacityManager - The host capacity manager which records the capacity of each host in the data center.
      cpuAvailableSum - The total available CPU resources of the data center.
      ramAvailableSum - The total available RAM resources of the data center.
      storageAvailableSum - The total available storage resources of the data center.
      bwAvailableSum - The total available bandwidth resources of the data center.

  • Method Details

    • getHostState

      public HostState getHostState(int hostId)
      Get the status of the host synchronized to with the given host id.
      Parameters:
      hostId - The id of the host.
      Returns:
      The status of the host.

    • getHostCapacity

      public int[] getHostCapacity(int hostId)
      Get the capacity of the host with the given host id, including CPU, RAM, storage, and bandwidth.
      Parameters:
      hostId - The id of the host.
      Returns:
      The capacity of the host.

    • allocate

      public DetailedDcStateSimple allocate(Instance instance, int hostId)
      Change the status of the host after allocating the instance to it. It is used to update the status of the host from the scheduler's perspective after the instance is allocated to the host.
      Parameters:
      instance - The instance to be allocated.
      hostId - The id of the host.
      Returns:
      The DetailedDcStateSimple itself.
